message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product for $100. I believe it's a fair price considering its value and quality.
I appreciate your enthusiasm for the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $85. I'm willing to make a deal, but I need to stay within my budget.
Thank you for your response, Bob. I understand your budget constraints. Let me make you an offer of $90 for the product. I hope this aligns better with your financial considerations.
I appreciate your flexibility, Alice, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $87.50. Can we make a deal at this price?
